mapper.insert: insert into book_lecture (stu_number, room_number, lec_number, row, collumn, time, date, score) values (#{stuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lecNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{row,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collumn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIME}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.select: select stu_number, room_number, lec_number, row, collumn, time, date, score from book_lecture
